name: Featured Collection Tabs 6
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign width = section.settings.width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius 

  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile 
  assign content_max_width = section.settings.content_max_width

  assign tabs_gap = section.settings.tabs_gap
  assign tabs_gap_mobile = section.settings.tabs_gap_mobile
  assign tabs_mt = section.settings.tabs_mt
  assign tabs_mt_mobile = section.settings.tabs_mt_mobile

  assign tab_padding_horizontal = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal
  assign tab_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign tab_padding_vertical = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical
  assign tab_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign tab_bg_color = section.settings.tab_bg_color
  assign tab_bg_hover_color = section.settings.tab_bg_hover_color
  assign tab_bg_active_color = section.settings.tab_bg_active_color
  assign tab_border_thickness = section.settings.tab_border_thickness
  assign tab_border_color = section.settings.tab_border_color
  assign tab_border_hover_color = section.settings.tab_border_hover_color
  assign tab_border_active_color = section.settings.tab_border_active_color
  assign tab_radius = section.settings.tab_radius
  assign tab_custom = section.settings.tab_custom
  assign tab_font = section.settings.tab_font
  assign tab_size = section.settings.tab_size
  assign tab_size_mobile = section.settings.tab_size_mobile
  assign tab_height = section.settings.tab_height
  assign tab_color = section.settings.tab_color
  assign tab_hover_color = section.settings.tab_hover_color
  assign tab_active_color = section.settings.tab_active_color
  assign tab_background = section.settings.tab_background

  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile

  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile 
  assign image_hover_type = section.settings.image_hover_type
  
  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_content_align = section.settings.slide_content_align
  assign slide_content_align_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_align_mobile

  assign slide_content_horizontal_align = ""
  if slide_content_align == "center"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif slide_content_align == "right"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if slide_content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif slide_content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color    

  assign vendor_custom = section.settings.vendor_custom
  assign vendor_font = section.settings.vendor_font
  assign vendor_size = section.settings.vendor_size
  assign vendor_size_mobile = section.settings.vendor_size_mobile
  assign vendor_height = section.settings.vendor_height
  assign vendor_color = section.settings.vendor_color    
  assign vendor_mt = section.settings.vendor_mt
  assign vendor_mt_mobile = section.settings.vendor_mt_mobile
  assign show_vendor = section.settings.show_vendor

  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_color = section.settings.price_color
  assign price_original_color = section.settings.price_original_color
  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_compare = section.settings.price_compare
  assign price_mt = section.settings.price_mt
  assign price_mt_mobile = section.settings.price_mt_mobile

  assign show_details = section.settings.show_details
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign button = section.settings.button
  assign use_button = section.settings.use_button
  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_style = section.settings.button_style
  assign button_open_in_new_tab = section.settings.button_open_in_new_tab

  assign product_button = section.settings.product_button
  assign product_button_size = section.settings.product_button_size
  assign product_button_size_mobile = section.settings.product_button_size_mobile
  assign product_button_color = section.settings.product_button_color
  assign product_button_hover_color = section.settings.product_button_hover_color
  assign product_button_custom = section.settings.product_button_custom
  assign product_button_font = section.settings.product_button_font
  assign product_button_height = section.settings.product_button_height
  assign product_button_padding_vertical = section.settings.product_button_padding_vertical
  assign product_button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.product_button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign product_button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.product_button_padding_horizontal
  assign product_button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.product_button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign product_button_radius = section.settings.product_button_radius
  assign product_button_border_thickness = section.settings.product_button_border_thickness
  assign product_button_border_color = section.settings.product_button_border_color
  assign product_button_border_hover_color = section.settings.product_button_border_hover_color
  assign product_button_bg_color = section.settings.product_button_bg_color
  assign product_button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.product_button_bg_hover_color
  assign product_button_mt = section.settings.product_button_mt
  assign product_button_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_button_mt_mobile
  assign product_button_style = section.settings.product_button_style
  assign product_button_open_in_new_tab = section.settings.product_button_open_in_new_tab

  assign navigation_mt = section.settings.navigation_mt
  assign navigation_mt_mobile = section.settings.navigation_mt_mobile
  assign navigation_align = section.settings.navigation_align
  assign navigation_align_mobile = section.settings.navigation_align_mobile

  assign navigation_content_horizontal_align = ""
  if navigation_align == "center"
    assign navigation_content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif navigation_align == "right"
    assign navigation_content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign navigation_content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign navigation_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if navigation_align_mobile == "center"
    assign navigation_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif navigation_align_mobile == "right"
    assign navigation_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign navigation_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ tab_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ vendor_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ product_button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .featured-collection-shape-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
    position: absolute;
    width: 1900px;
    height: 1900px;
    top: 0;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-1600px) rotate(45deg);
    transform-origin: center center;
    z-index: 0;
    border-radius: 100px;
    transition: background-color .3s ease;
  }

  @media(max-width: 1624px) {
    .featured-collection-shape-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 1800px;
      height: 1800px;
    }
  }

  @media(max-width: 1224px) {
    .featured-collection-shape-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 1700px;
      height: 1700px;
    }
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px !important;   
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .collection-top-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow-x: scroll;
    scrollbar-width: none;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;    
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0 !important;
    width: 100% !important;
  } 

  .featured-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    height: auto !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    transform: scale(0.8) !important;
  }

  .featured-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
    transform: scale(1.2) !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: translateY(0%);
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative !important;
    height: 100%; 
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    transform: scale(0.85) !important;
    transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
    margin-top: 15px;
    z-index: 2;
    gap: {{ tabs_gap_mobile }}px;    
    margin-top: {{ tabs_mt_mobile }}px;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    overflow-x: scroll;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .collection-tabs-{{ section.id }}::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none;
  }

  .featured-tab-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    {% if tab_background %}
    padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ tab_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_color }};
    {% endif %}
    font-size: {{ tab_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tab_height }}%;
    color: {{ tab_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 400;
    text-wrap: nowrap;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-tab-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    {% if tab_background %}
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_hover_color }};
    {% endif %}
    color: {{ tab_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-tab-{{ section.id }}.active {
    {% if tab_background %}
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_active_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_active_color }};
    {% endif %}
    color: {{ tab_active_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: translateY(-25%);
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }
  
  .featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0;
    transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    flex: 1 1 0;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active .featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;    
    transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }    

  .featured-vendor-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    margin-top: {{ vendor_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ vendor_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ vendor_color }};
    line-height: {{ vendor_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ price_color }};
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-style: normal;
  }

  .featured-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0.8;
    color: {{ price_original_color }};
    text-decoration: line-through !important;
  }
  
  .featured-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }  
  
  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    margin: 0;   
    margin-top: {{ product_button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ product_button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_button_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ product_button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ product_button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ product_button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-product-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ product_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    background-color: transparent !important;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ product_button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ product_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;   
    z-index: 2;
    margin-top: 20px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
  }

  .featured-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    background-color: transparent !important;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 20px;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    position: static !important;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 35%;    
  }

  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 35%;    
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }


  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px !important;
      margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
    }

    .featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
    }    

    .featured-vendor-{{ section.id }} { 
      margin-top: {{ vendor_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ vendor_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
    }

    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ price_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ slide_content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
    }

    .featured-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }   
    .collection-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: center;
      overflow-x: hidden;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      margin-top: {{ tabs_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ tabs_gap }}px;    
      margin-left: 0rem !important;
      margin-right: 0rem !important;
      padding-left: 0rem !important;
      padding-right: 0rem !important;
    }

    .featured-tab-{{ section.id }} {
      {% if tab_background %}
      padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal }}px;
      {% endif %}
      font-size: {{ tab_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-product-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ product_button_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ product_button_padding_vertical }}px {{ product_button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ product_button_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-button-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: fit-content;
      margin-top: 0px;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      position: absolute !important;
      z-index: 2;
      transform: translateY(-80%);
      top: 80%;
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if width == 'custom' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }

{% elsif width == 'page' %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}

    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}

    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) transform: translateY(-70%);;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) transform: translateY(-70%);;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {

      }

{% endif %}

    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

  <style>

      background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
    }

    .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif button_style == "outline" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
  <style>
    .featured-button-{{ section.id }} {
      background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
      border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    }

    .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {

      padding: 0px !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_hover_type == "second_image" %}
  <style>      
    .featured-second-image-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;  
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-first-image-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;  
      }

      .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-second-image-{{ section.id }} {
        -webkit-animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.25s linear;
        animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.25s linear;   
        display: block !important;  
      } 

      @keyframes opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
        0% {
          opacity: 0;
        }
        100% {
          opacity: 1;
        }
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_hover_type == "zoom" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }} img,
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
        transform: translateZ(0);
        transition: transform 1.2s cubic-bezier(.4,0,0,1);
      }
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }}:hover img,
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }}:hover svg {
      transform: scale(1.1) translateZ(0);
      transition: transform 1.2s cubic-bezier(.4,0,0,1);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 15px;    
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-slide:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: 0px;
    } 

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-slide {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'heading' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
            position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
        }
      
        .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} * strong {
          text-decoration: underline {{ block.settings.heading_border_color }};
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ content_align }};            
            max-width: {{ content_max_width }}%;
          }
        
          .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }
        }          
      </style>
        
      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if content_align_mobile == "center" %}
        <style>
          .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align_mobile == "right" %}
        <style>
          .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if content_align == "center" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align == "right" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .featured-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: 0px;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'text' %}   
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        
        .featured-text-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
        }
      
        .featured-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .featured-text-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{  content_align }};            
            max-width: {{ content_max_width }}%;
          }
      
          .featured-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
          }
          
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
        <style>
          .featured-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
          }
        </style>          
      {% endif %}    
      
      {% if content_align_mobile == "center" %}
        <style>
          .featured-text-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align_mobile == "right" %}
        <style>
          .featured-text-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if content_align == "center" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .featured-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align == "right" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .featured-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .featured-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: 0px;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} featured-{{ section.id }}">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">  
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% case block.type %}
          {% when 'heading'%}
            {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
              <div class="featured-heading-{{ block.id }}">
                {{ block.settings.heading }}
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% when 'text' %}
            {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
              <div class="featured-text-{{ block.id }}">
                {{ block.settings.text }}
              </div>
            {% endif %}  
        {% endcase %}
      {% endfor %}

      <div class="featured-collection-shape-{{ section.id }}"></div>

     <div class="collection-tabs-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'collection' %}
            <p class="featured-tab-{{ section.id }}" 
               id="{{ block.id }}"
               data-bg-style="{{ block.settings.background_style }}"
               data-bg-color="{{ block.settings.background_color }}"
               data-bg-gradient="{{ block.settings.background_gradient }}"> 
               {% if block.settings.tab != blank %}
                 {{ block.settings.tab }}
               {% elsif block.settings.collection.title != blank %}
                 {{ block.settings.collection.title }}
               {% endif %}
            </p>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>

    
      <div class="featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
         {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'collection' %}
            <div class="featured-slider-{{ section.id }} preview swiper" 
                data-id="{{ block.id }}"
                data-gap="{{ slider_gap }}"
                data-gap-mobile="{{ slider_gap_mobile }}"
                data-view="{{ slider_view }}"
                data-view-mobile="{{ slider_view_mobile }}">
                <div class="swiper-wrapper">
                {% if block.settings.collection != blank %}
                    {% for i in (1..4) %}
                        {% for product in collections[block.settings.collection].products limit: block.settings.products_show %}
                            <div class="featured-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" data-background="{% if product.metafields.custom.product_background_color.value != blank %}{{ product.metafields.custom.product_background_color.value }}{% else %}{{ block.settings.shape_color }}{% endif %}">
                                <div class="featured-slide-{{ section.id }}">
                                <a href="{{ product.url }}" {% if product_button_open_in_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %} class="featured-images-{{ section.id }}">
                                    <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} {% if product.media.size > 1 and image_hover_type == 'second_image' %}featured-first-image-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">    
                                    {% if product.featured_image != blank %}
                                        <img src="{{ product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                                    {% else %}
                                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                                    {% endif %}  
                                    </div>  
                                    {% if product.media.size > 1 and image_hover_type == 'second_image' %}
                                    <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} featured-second-image-{{ section.id }}">
                                        {% if product.media.size > 1 %}
                                        {% for media in product.media %}
                                            {% if forloop.index == 2 %}
                                            <img src="{{ media | image_url }}" alt="{{ media.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                                            {% endif %}
                                        {% endfor %}
                                        {% endif %}
                                    </div>
                                    {% endif %}                      
                                </a>   
                                <div class="featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">
                                    <div class="featured-slide-top-content-{{ section.id }}">

    const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.featured-tab-{{ section.id }}');
    const sliders = document.querySelectorAll('.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}');
    const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.featured-button-{{ section.id }}');
    
    const sectionContainer = document.querySelector('.featured-{{ section.id }}');
    if(sectionContainer) {
        sectionContainer.style.transition = 'background 0.4s ease';
    }

    function updateSectionBackground(tab) {
        if (!sectionContainer || !tab) return;
        
        const style = tab.getAttribute('data-bg-style');
        const color = tab.getAttribute('data-bg-color');
        const gradient = tab.getAttribute('data-bg-gradient');

        if (style === 'gradient' && gradient) {
            sectionContainer.style.background = gradient;
        } else if (color) {
            sectionContainer.style.background = color;
        }
    }
    
    if (tabs.length > 0 && sliders.length > 0) {
      tabs.forEach(tab => tab.classList.remove('active'));
      sliders.forEach(slider => slider.classList.remove('active'));
      
      tabs[0].classList.add('active');
      sliders[0].classList.add('active');
      
      updateSectionBackground(tabs[0]);
    }
    
    const shape = document.querySelector('.featured-collection-shape-{{ section.id }}');
    
    function updateShapeColor(swiper) {
      const activeSlide = swiper.slides[swiper.activeIndex];
      const backgroundColor = activeSlide?.dataset?.background;
      
      if (shape && backgroundColor) {
        shape.style.backgroundColor = backgroundColor;
      }
    }
    
    const slider = new Swiper(".featured-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      centeredSlides: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      on: {
        init: function() {
          updateShapeColor(this);
        },
        slideChange: function() {
          updateShapeColor(this);
        }
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile || 1),
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 3),
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 3),
        }
      }
    });

    if(tabs) {
      tabs.forEach(tab => {
        tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
          sliders.forEach(slider => {
            slider.classList.remove('active')
          });
          tabs.forEach(tab => {
            tab.classList.remove('active')
          });            
          buttons.forEach(button => {
            button.classList.remove('active')
          }); 
        
          sliders.forEach(slider => {
            if(tab.id === slider.getAttribute('data-id')) {
              slider.classList.add('active');
              tab.classList.add('active');
              
              updateSectionBackground(tab);
              
              const swiperInstance = slider.swiper;
              if (swiperInstance) {
                updateShapeColor(swiperInstance);
              }
            } else {
              slider.classList.remove('active');
              tab.classList.add('active');
            }
          })

          buttons.forEach(button => {
            if(tab.id === button.getAttribute('data-id')) {
              button.classList.add('active');
              tab.classList.add('active');                
            } else {
              button.classList.remove('active');
              tab.classList.add('active');
            }
          })
        })        
      })
    }
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollectionTabs6);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollectionTabs6);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollectionTabs6);
  }
</script>
